message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to own our premium product. Given its value and significance to both of us, I believe it's important to approach this transaction with mutual respect and understanding. Considering the product's worth and your interest in it, I propose a special introductory price of $14000. This offer reflects my desire to make the product accessible while ensuring a fair return for its value. Please let me know if this proposal meets your expectations or if there's any way I can assist you further in making your decision.
